People saved my posts 1 million times this year.

But they will never know AI is behind them:

1. To find topics: Perplexity, ChatGPT.
2. To design images: Canva, Gemini, GPT, Gamma.
3. To write like me: ChatGPT, Claude, EasyGen.
4. To type words with my voice: Wispr Flow.
5. To edit videos (very quickly): Opus Clip.
6. To build internal apps: Blink.

Most people overcomplicate it. 
But it’s simple if you start with the right guides:
